param.name: push_url
param.description: Custom repository push url. If not specified then the url specified in the url property is used for push operations. @see url

param.name: reportTagRevisions
param.description: When enabled tags matched by branch specification will be shown in UI as regular branches. By default false.

param.name: usernameStyle
param.description: Defines a way how TeamCity binds VCS changes to the users.

param.name: submoduleCheckout
param.description: Whether VCS root should include changes in submodules and check their sources for build. By default true.

param.name: userForTags
param.description: A username for tag/merge operations in this VCS root. Format: Username <email>

param.name: serverSideAutoCrlf
param.description: Whether TeamCity should convert line-endings of all text files to CRLF during server-side checkout. By default false.

param.name: agentGitPath
param.description: Custom path to git executable on the build agent machine

param.name: agentCleanPolicy
param.description: Specifies when the "git clean" command should be executed in case of agent-side checkout

param.name: agentCleanFilesPolicy
param.description: Specifies which files should be removed when "git clean" command is executed during agent-side checkout.

param.name: useAlternates
param.description: When this option is enabled, TeamCity creates a separate clone of the repository on each agent and uses it in the checkout directory via git alternates. This make agent-side checkout faster. By default true.
